item.description: Join Untapped Games for our MTG Dark Ascension sealed tournament on Saturday, January 28th, 2012 at 1pm. New players and MTG veterans are all welcome! The cost for the tournament is $15, in which you recieve 3 Innistrad booster packs and 3 Dark Ascension booster packs in order to play in the tournament. These prerelease cards are yours to keep! ADDED BONUS! Plus, if you want a chance to win even bigger prizes you can enter with a $5 buy-in that adds two booster packs to the prize pool! Location: Untapped Games 545 Pawtucket Ave Suite A104 Pawtucket, RI 02860 We are in The Mills (a big brick mill building), right on the Providence-Pawtucket line. Ample parking is available! From the parking lot go through the left most silver door and follow the green signs to Untapped Games in Suite A104! You can also go through the main entrance across the street from Gold's Gym, but it may be locked after 5PM. Feel free to call 401-368-1619 if you have any questions or need help finding us!
item.name: [Pawtucket, RI] $15 MTG Dark Ascension Prerelease Sealed Deck Tournament
